name: Dampen Presence
description: Your habitual stillness makes you difficult to perceive for creatures that use blindsight or blindsense.
benefit: You may use the Stealth skill to hide from any creature attempting to perceive you using blindsight or blindsense, even if you are clearly in that creatureâ€™s perceptual field. This feat does not confer any advantages against other forms of perception, such as scent, vision, or tremorsense.
